    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplaceBlockHandler

        public DisplaceBlockHandler​(SharedData sharedData)

    • Method Detail

      • handleReleaseInPAAt

        public void handleReleaseInPAAt​(UIBlock draggedBlock,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        Handles logic for when a block is dropped in the Program Area. It handles the BiMap addition, the drop position and the highlight.
        Parameters:
        draggedBlock - The dropped block.
        x - The x coordinate of the drop.
        y - The y coordinate of the drop.
        Preconditions:
        draggedBlock.getPosition() is inside the PA.

      • handleReleaseOutsidePA

        public void handleReleaseOutsidePA​(UIBlock draggedBlock)
        Handles logic for when a block is dropped outside the Program Area. It removes all bodies and conditions connected to this Block from the Program Area and then removes the Block. Then it sets the highlight.
        Parameters:
        draggedBlock - The dropped block.

      • getAllUIBlocksInPA

        public java.util.List<UIBlock> getAllUIBlocksInPA()
        Gets all the UIBlocks in the Program Area.
        Returns:
        A list of UIBlocks.

      • handleClickOn

        public void handleClickOn​(UIBlock clickedBlock)
        Handles the logic when a block is clicked. It sets the previous drop position for an undo, removes the Block from the Program Area, adjusts the Program Area and sets the highlight.
        Parameters:
        clickedBlock - The clicked block.
